name: stig_ibm_hardware_management_console_hmc_policies
description: Policy and Documentation Vulnerabilities for IBM Hardware Management Console (HMC).
title: IBM Hardware Management Console (HMC) STIG Policies

items.title: Initial Program Load (IPL) Procedures must exists for each partition defined to the system.
items.description: If procedures for performing IPLs are not in place, it is extremely difficult to ensure overall operating system integrity.

items.title: Power On Reset (POR) Procedures must be documented for each system.
items.description: If procedures for performing PORs are not in place, it is extremely difficult to ensure overall operating system integrity

items.title: System shutdown procedures documentation must exist for each partition defined to the system.
items.description: If procedures for performing system shutdowns are not in place, it is extremely difficult to ensure overall data and operating system integrity.

items.title: Backup of critical data for the HMC and its components  must be documented and tracked
items.description: If procedures for performing backup and recovery of critical data for the HMC  is not in place, system recoverability may be jeopardized and overall security compromised.
